article_title: Will New China Football League Surpass NFL?

article_metadata.author: Steve Forbes

og.description: AT A TIME OF TENSION between Washington and Beijing—China’s worrying naval assertiveness, serious charges of cyber-spying, trade restrictions and protection of intellectual property—here’s a piece of good news: American-style football is coming to the Middle Kingdom. Chinese sports authorities have formally approved the creation of the country’s first football league. The [...]
